thread.section_title: Hotel Westminster - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Charming
thread.title_full: Charming - Review of Hotel Westminster, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: pestefm
title: Charming
text: An old hotel, very comfortable and warm, rich in details. Rooms are big and have a strange/old configuration: the toilet and bath are different spaces! The bar is the most interesting space, really cozy. Some people staff talk Portuguese, what is a plus. A minus: the ambient music. Not only is completely unnecessary, but is bad! In a place like this, should be Classic. Or silence, even better.
